column9: Izzy has quickly established herself as an extremely sought after stylist.
column10: Her natural flair with creating beautiful, wearable styles has built her a strong following.
column11: Izzy recently won the National Redken Style Innovator award. She is also a specialist in extensions.

column9: Kelly has over 15 years experience working in Warrington town centre.
column10: Sheâ€™s been a member of the PK team from day one and is a key player in the success of the salon.
column11: She specialises in long hair styling and is also one of the extension experts within the salon.

column9: Jo is a fantastic stylist with many years experience, she's a real long standing asset to the team.
column10: Her down to earth nature instantly puts you at ease and her hairdressing skills really shine.
column11: She loves doing men and women's hair. Book well in advance - she's a very busy stylist.

column9: Michelle is an incredibly talented Senior stylist with over 13 years experience.
column10: She's a truly diverse hairdresser - she loves creating statement colours and pushing the boundaries with her cutting and styling.
column11: Her friendly personality and exceptionally high levels of customer care make her a big hit within the salon.

column9: Brad joined the team at the end of last year and is already full settled into PK life. He's 23 and has built up a diverse range of skills over the 3 years he's been hairdressing.
column10: He loves creating balayage's and vivid colour melts.
column11: Brad is a full time stylist and his friendly, relaxed approach makes him a perfect addition to the team.

column9: Abi is an extremely progressive hairdresser and has recently been promoted to a Stylist.
column10: She produces some beautiful cuts, colours and styles.
column11: Her friendly, approachable personality ensures she always gets 5 star feedback from her clients.

column9: David is the latest addition to the PK team. He is a progressive Graduate stylist with loads of natural flair and a mega friendly personality.
column10: He completed his apprenticeship at the highly respected Andrew Collinge Graduates then spent a few months at our Base Academy. He's now a fully fledged member of the PK team and is looking to build his client base.
